tuningTable.name: webready.TranscriptSequence
tuningTable.sql: create table TranscriptSequenceAmoeba nologging as select * from webready.TranscriptSequence@amoeba.tuning
create table TranscriptSequenceCrypto nologging as select * from webready.TranscriptSequence@crypto.tuning
create table TranscriptSequenceFungi nologging as select * from webready.TranscriptSequence@fungi.tuning

create table TranscriptSequenceHost nologging as select * from webready.TranscriptSequence@host.tuning

create table TranscriptSequence&1 nologging as ( select * from webready.TranscriptSequenceAmoeba union all select * from webready.TranscriptSequenceCrypto union all select * from webready.TranscriptSequenceFungi union all select * from webready.TranscriptSequenceGiardia union all select * from webready.TranscriptSequenceHost union all select * from webready.TranscriptSequenceMicro union all select * from webready.TranscriptSequencePiro union all select * from webready.TranscriptSequencePlasmo union all select * from webready.TranscriptSequenceToxo union all select * from webready.TranscriptSequenceTrich union all select * from webready.TranscriptSequenceTritryp union all select * from webready.TranscriptSequenceVect )
create index XScriptSeq_ix&1 on webready.TranscriptSequence&1 (source_id, project_id)

create table EstSequenceTrich nologging as select * from webready.EstSequence@trich.tuning

tuningTable.sql: create table PopsetSequenceAmoeba nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequence@amoeba.tuning
create table PopsetSequenceCrypto nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequence@crypto.tuning
create table PopsetSequenceFungi nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequence@fungi.tuning
create table PopsetSequenceGiardia nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequence@giardia.tuning
create table PopsetSequenceMicro nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequence@micro.tuning
create table PopsetSequencePiro nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequence@piro.tuning
create table PopsetSequencePlasmo nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequence@plasmo.tuning
create table PopsetSequenceToxo nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequence@toxo.tuning
create table PopsetSequenceTrich nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequence@trich.tuning

create table PopsetSequenceVect nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequence@vect.tuning

create table PopsetSequence&1 nologging as ( select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequenceAmoeba union all select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequenceCrypto union all select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequenceFungi union all select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequenceGiardia union all select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequenceMicro union all select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequencePiro union all select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequencePlasmo union all select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequenceToxo union all select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequenceTrich union all select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequenceTritryp union all select * from ApidbTuning.PopsetSequenceVect )
create index PopsetSeq_ix&1 on ApidbTuning.PopsetSequence&1 (source_id, project_id)

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.Statistics
tuningTable.sql: create table Statistics&1 nologging as select taxa.project_id, taxa.organism, genes.gene_count, transcripts.transcript_count, cdss.cds_count, proteins.protein_count, sequences.sequence_count, sequences.total_sequence_length, ests.est_count from (select project_id, organism from webready.GeneAttributes union select project_id, organism from webready.GenomicSeqAttributes union select project_id, organism from webready.EstAttributes) taxa, (select project_id, organism, count(*) gene_count from webready.GeneAttributes group by project_id, organism) genes, (select ga.project_id, ga.organism, count(*) transcript_count from webready.GeneAttributes ga, webready.TranscriptSequence ts where ga.source_id = ts.source_id and ga.project_id = ts.project_id and ts.sequence is not null group by ga.project_id, ga.organism) transcripts, (select ga.project_id, ga.organism, count(*) cds_count from webready.GeneAttributes ga, webready.CodingSequence seq where ga.source_id = seq.source_id and ga.project_id = seq.project_id and seq.sequence is not null group by ga.project_id, ga.organism) cdss, (select ga.project_id, ga.organism, count(*) protein_count from webready.GeneAttributes ga, webready.ProteinSequence seq where ga.source_id = seq.source_id and ga.project_id = seq.project_id and seq.sequence is not null group by ga.project_id, ga.organism) proteins, (select project_id, organism, count(*) sequence_count, sum(length) total_sequence_length from webready.GenomicSeqAttributes sa where is_top_level = 1 group by project_id, organism) sequences, (select attrs.project_id, attrs.organism, count(*) est_count from webready.EstAttributes attrs, webready.EstSequence seq where attrs.source_id = seq.source_id and attrs.project_id = seq.project_id and seq.sequence is not null group by attrs.project_id, attrs.organism) ests where taxa.project_id = genes.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = genes.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = transcripts.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = transcripts.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = cdss.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = cdss.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = proteins.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = proteins.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = sequences.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = sequences.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = ests.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = ests.organism(+) order by taxa.project_id, taxa.organism

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.PopsetStatistics
tuningTable.sql: create table PopsetStatistics&1 nologging as select project_id, genus, count(*) popset_count from (select ia.project_id, substr(ia.organism, 1, instr(ia.organism||' ', ' ') - 1) genus from ApidbTuning.PopsetAttributes ia, ApidbTuning.PopsetSequence iseq where ia.source_id = iseq.source_id and ia.project_id = iseq.project_id) group by project_id, genus order by project_id, genus

tuningTable.name: webready.CompoundAttributes
tuningTable.sql: create table CompoundAttributes&1 nologging as ( select t.*, 'PlasmoDB' as project_id from webready.CompoundAttributes@plasmo.tuning t )

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.GeneModelCharOrgMD
